posts.post_content:
Floating the idea of trading for the following cards:

Lajoie w/bat
Evers portrait
Waddell portrait
Eddie Collins portrait
Joss portrait
Matty portrait
Matty black cap

Southern leaguers:
Otey
Ryan
Fritz
Violat

Ideal condition is 2-3 range, or raw equivalent. Will consider cards outside this range. Let me know if any of you are interested. Willing to add cash where needed.

Here’s what I got:
Elberfeld - EPDG (fielding) SGC 50
Russ Ford - Tolstoi SGC 30
Schaefer - Piedmont SGC 60
Abbatticcio - Sweet SGC 2.5
Tenney - Piedmont - raw VG
Ames (hands above head) - Sweet Cap 42 OP - raw VG 
Hoffman - Polar Bear - raw GD
Frill - Sweet Cap - raw GD
Pelty (horizontal) - Sweet Cap - raw GD
Merritt - Sov 350 - PSA 1
Dots Miller - EPDG - PSA 2
Harry Davis - Piedmont -  PSA 2 (awesome crop mark)
George Brown (Chicago) - Piedmont - PSA 3
Al Burch w/bat - Piedmont - PSA 2

Please reach out to me via PM or at [url]wazywhoa@gmail.com[/url] for
Pictures. 

Let’s make a trade!

The following have been traded:

Dots
Ford
Hoffman
